error.highlight: Thaz ni ist thiu gizeigotu cholba. Firsuoh thia gizeigotun cholbun klikkōn.

basic-1.title: Gruondlīh Zuotuon: 0 + 1
basic-1.description: Beginnan thuruh zuotuon thīneru ēristen erda cholbun
basic-1.actionDescription: Klikkōn thia ērista erda cholbun zi rukkēnne sī ūf

tooltip.explanation: Erda cholbun (untana) sint 1 iogilīh wert. Stōzzan siu ŪF zi machen siu gibārenti.

basic-2.title: Gruondlīh Zuotuon: 1 + 1
basic-2.description: Zuotuon thia anderu erda cholbun zi machōnne 2
basic-2.actionDescription: Klikkōn thia anderu erda cholbun zi rukkēnne sī ūf

tooltip.explanation: Fora tuon zuotuon erda cholbun ein thuruh ein furi zalun 2, 3, inti 4

basic-3.title: Gruondlīh Zuotuon: 2 + 1
basic-3.description: Zuotuon thia thrittun erda cholbun zi machōnne 3
basic-3.actionDescription: Klikkōn thia thrittun erda cholbun zi rukkēnne sī ūf

tooltip.explanation: Fora tuon zuotuon erda cholbun ein thuruh ein unzan thū rehhēs 4

basic-4.title: Gruondlīh Zuotuon: 3 + 1
basic-4.description: Zuotuon thia fiordun erda cholbun zi machōnne 4
basic-4.actionDescription: Klikkōn thia fiordun erda cholbun zi folbringanne 4

tooltip.explanation: Fior erda cholbun ist thaz meista - aftero wir thurfen anderu weg

heaven-intro.title: Himil Cholba: 0 + 5
heaven-intro.description: Bruhhen thia himil cholbun zi bezeichnōnne 5
heaven-intro.actionDescription: Klikkōn thia himil cholbun zi machen sī gibārenti

tooltip.explanation: Thiu einluzīgiu cholba obar theru rigilīn bezeichnōt 5

heaven-plus-earth.title: Gisamanunga: 5 + 1
heaven-plus-earth.description: Zuotuon 1 zi 5 thuruh machen ein erda cholbun gibārenti
heaven-plus-earth.actionDescription: Klikkōn thia ērista erda cholbun zi machōnne 6

tooltip.explanation: Hwanne thū habēs rūm in theru erda teilu, einfalt tuon zuotuon reht

complement-intro.title: Fimf Irfullida: 3 + 4
complement-intro.description: Thurfen zuotuon 4, ouh nihabēn nur 1 erda cholba rūm. Bruhhen irfullida: 4 = 5 - 1
complement-intro.actionDescription: Ērist zuotuon himil cholbun (5), thanne abaziohan 1 erda cholbun

tooltip.explanation: Hwanne thū thurfs zuotuon 4 ouh nur habēs 1 rūm, bruhhe: zuotuon 5, abaziohan 1

multiStepInstructions: Klikkōn thia himil cholbun zi zuotuonne 5
Klikkōn thia ērista erda cholbun zi abaziohanne 1

complement-2.title: Fimf Irfullida: 2 + 3
complement-2.description: Zuotuon 3 zi machōnne 5 thuruh bruhhēn irfullida: 3 = 5 - 2
complement-2.actionDescription: Zuotuon himil cholbun (5), thanne abaziohan 2 erda cholbun

tooltip.explanation: Zi zuotuonne 3, thenken: 3 = 5 - 2, so zuotuon 5 inti neman inwek 2

multiStepInstructions: Klikkōn thia himil cholbun zi zuotuonne 5
Klikkōn thia ērista erda cholbun zi abaziohanne sī
Klikkōn thia anderu erda cholbun zi abaziohanne sī

complex-1.title: Giwīh: 6 + 2
complex-1.description: Zuotuon 2 mēra zi 6 (thiu habet himil + 1 erda)

tooltip.explanation: Hwanne thū habēs rūm in theru erda teilu, nur tuon zuotuon reht

complex-2.title: Giwīh: 7 + 4
complex-2.description: Zuotuon 4 zi 7, ouh nihein rūm furi 4 erda cholbun. Bruhhen irfullida eft
complex-2.actionDescription: Zuotuon zehanzala himil, thanne reinēn einzala stat: abaziohan himil + 2 erda

tooltip.explanation: 7 + 4 = 11, thaz thurfit thia zehanzala spaltun himil cholbun

multiStepInstructions: Klikkōn thia himil cholbun in theru zehanzala spaltun (winistaru)
Klikkōn thia himil cholbun in theru einzala spaltun zi abaziohanne sī
Klikkōn thia ērista erda cholbun zi abaziohanne sī
Klikkōn thia anderu erda cholbun zi abaziohanne sī
